EmailTemplate.subject: PODCAST: How to Differentiate with ATM Marketing
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consumers know you have their data. And they expect you to use it to personalize the offers you present to them. No 20-year-old wants to see retirement planning messages (yet). Today’s consumers want you to understand them—and know when they need a car loan, low credit card rates or a new mortgage. And there is a strong payoff. According to Epsilon, 80% of consumers are more likely to make a purchase from a brand that provides personalized experiences. Your financial institution can do this. And do it well with NCR ATM Marketing.
